sentences.english: Laryngeal electromyography (LEMG) plays a potentially significant role in the diagnosis of neuromuscular disorder of the larynx .
sentences.chinese: 喉肌电图为诊断喉部肌肉及神经性疾病的直接方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical significance of single fiber electromyography in diabetic peripheral neuropathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨单纤维肌电图在糖尿病周围神经病中的应用。

sentences.english: This paper introduces an EMG multi-gateway analysis diagnosis and information management system.
sentences.chinese: 介绍所开发的肌电图多途径分析诊断及信息管理系统。

sentences.english: The clinical value of EMG of polymyositis was discussed in the pape…
sentences.chinese: 文中还讨论了本病肌电图检查的临床价值。

sentences.english: Needle electromyography of anterior tibial muscle showed fibrillations and positive sharp waves.
sentences.chinese: 发病兔胫前肌肌电图可见正相尖波和纤颤电位。

sentences.english: The clinical value of EMG of polymyositis was discussed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中还讨论了本病肌电图检查的临床价值。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the role of electromyogram and electroneurogram to diagnose the tarsal tunnel syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肌电图和神经电图对踝管综合征的诊断作用。

sentences.english: Aim To study the clinical significance of single fiber electromyography in diabetic peripheral neuropathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨单纤维肌电图在糖尿病周围神经病中的应用。
